answers.author: Gregory Stopka
answers.text:
Hi Jennifer,
The City of Brooklyn Park, MN has an excellent program called BusinessForward:  http://www.brooklynpark.org/city-government/business-development/business-forward.  They have solicited input from focus groups and surveys and have begun to implement projects based on the feedback.
Thanks,
Greg Stopka
Central Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation

author: Jennifer Kimball
text: Does anyone have experience surveying businesses to get feedback on how the local government serves the business community?  We would appreciate copies of surveys, input on survey questions, names of companies that conduct business surveys, cost and tips for getting a high response rate.
title: Business Surveys
